sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="fill-height">
    <v-row align="center" justify="center">
      <v-col cols="11" xs="11" sm="10" md="8">
        <v-card elevation="10" height="300">
          <v-card-title>
            {{ $t("Home.H1") }}
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-subtitle>
            {{ $t("Home.S1") }}
          </v-card-subtitle>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="11" xs="10" sm="10" md="4">
        <v-card elevation="10" height="300">
          <v-card-title>
            Premia acciones!
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="4">
                <v-hover v-slot="{ hover }">
                  <v-card
                    :elevation="hover ? 12 : 2"
                    :class="{ 'on-hover': hover }"
                  >
                    <v-img src="../assets/pasion.png"> </v-img>
                  </v-card>
                </v-hover>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="4">
                <v-hover v-slot="{ hover }">
                  <v-card
                    :elevation="hover ? 12 : 2"
                    :class="{ 'on-hover': hover }"
                  >
                    <v-img src="../assets/integridad.png"></v-img> </v-card
                ></v-hover>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="4">
                <v-hover v-slot="{ hover }">
                  <v-card
                    :elevation="hover ? 12 : 2"
                    :class="{ 'on-hover': hover }"
                  >
                    <v-img src="../assets/respeto.png"></v-img> </v-card
                ></v-hover>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row align="center" justify="center">
      <v-col cols="11" xs="10" sm="10" md="6">
        <v-card elevation="10" height="300">
          <v-card-title>
            {{ $t("Home.H3") }}
          </v-card-title>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
      <v-col cols="11" xs="10" sm="10" md="6">
        <v-card elevation="10" height="300">
          <v-card-title>
            {{ $t("Home.H4") }}
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-subtitle>
            {{ $t("Home.S2") }}
          </v-card-subtitle>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "Home",
  data() {
    return {};
  },
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.v-card {
  transition: opacity .4s ease-in-out;
}

.v-card:not(.on-hover) {
  opacity: 0.6;
 }

.show-btns {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) !important;
}
</style>
